name: admin.teams.settings.setDiscoverability
desc: An API method that allows admins to set the discoverability of a given workspace

discoverability.desc: This workspace's discovery setting. It must be set to one of `open`, `invite_only`, `closed`, or `unlisted`.

team_id.desc: The ID of the workspace to set discoverability on.

errors.discoverability_setting_invalid: The discovery setting must be set to one of `open`, `invite_only`, `closed`, or `unlisted`.
errors.failed_to_set_discoverability: There was an error setting the discoverability of this workspace.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
